info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 4:55PM MDT until March 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Western Otero County in south central New Mexico... Dona Ana County in south central New Mexico... Northwestern El Paso County in western Texas...
* Until 700 PM MDT.
* At 454 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was over White Sands Missile Range Headquarters.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with damaging winds in excess of 60 mph.
SOURCE...Department of Transportation traffic cameras.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 111 and 163. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 47. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 212. Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 18 and 89.
Locations impacted include... Fort Selden State Historic Site, Hatch, Radium Springs, Boles Acres, Mesilla, Dona Ana, Afton Generating Plant, San Miguel, Kilbourne Hole, Lake Lucero, Talavera, High Valley, Corralitos, Northrup Landing, East Mesa, Mesquite, Afton, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Dripping Springs, and Aden Crater.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:00 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:00 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:00 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:00 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Dona Ana, NM; Otero, NM; El Paso, TX
